SettingsPane - Class in controller_view
This is the SettingsPane, which will be displayed on the GUI for the user to be able to change the settings of their next game, including dimension, gameMode, and gameTheme.

The constructor for the SettingsPane.
setupGameSettings(int, int, int) - Method in class controller_view.memoryGUI
Given dimension, game mode, and theme, this function sets the game settings in the instance variables of this class.
shopCollection - Class in model
The shopCollection class is a wrapper for an ArrayList of shop items, including other methods that allow for adding and manipulating the array of shop items for the MemoryGame application.
shopCollection() - Constructor for class model.shopCollection
The constructor for shopCollection, initializes the arrayList.

startNewGame(int, int, int) - Method in class controller_view.BoardPane
This method creates a new MemoryGame, adding this Pane as an observer, initializes the game, and sets the game prompt.
StatsPane - Class in controller_view
The StatsPane class is a BorderPane that is added to memoryGUI to view game statistics of the current user.
